action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of six Tetris-like blocks in different colors and shapes. From top to bottom and left to right: the first block is a red 'L' shape; next to it is a purple 'T' shape followed by a red 'Z' shape. Below the first red 'L' shape is an orange 'T' shape; next to it is a yellow 'T' shape with an extra block at the bottom, making it look like a cross; and the last one is a purple 'J' shape. The background is white, and the blocks are pixelated, resembling the classic Tetris game pieces.
continue

There is a green L-shaped block in the center right side. A grey T-shaped block is located in the bottom center, and a grey plus sign (+) shaped block is in the center left. The background is white.
